data_meta.titleEn: Inquiring about Shuttle Service to Shopping Mall at a Hotel
data_meta.titleKo: Inquiring about Shuttle Service to Shopping Mall at a Hotel

sentences.speaker: Jack
sentences.sentence: "I heard there is a complimentary service to the nearby shopping center.

sentences.speaker: Jack
sentences.sentence: Could you tell me more about it?"

sentences.speaker: Linda
sentences.sentence: "Yes, we have a shuttle service that goes to the mall. I

sentences.speaker: Linda
sentences.sentence: t leaves every hour starting from 10 AM."

sentences.speaker: Jack
sentences.sentence: What time is the last shuttle back to the hotel?

sentences.speaker: Linda
sentences.sentence: The last shuttle from the mall back to the hotel is at 9 PM.

expressions.desc: 대화에서 Linda는 '셔틀'이라는 단어를 사용하여 호텔이 고객을 쇼핑몰로 운송하기 위해 제공하는 차량 서비스를 가리킵니다.
expressions.example_en: The hotel provides a shuttle service to the airport.

sentences.sentence: "근처 쇼핑 센터로 가는 무료 서비스가 있다고 들었습니다.
좀 더 자세히 알려주실 수 있나요?"
"네, 우리는 쇼핑몰로 가는 셔틀 서비스를 운영하고 있습니다.
쇼핑몰에서 호텔로 돌아오는 마지막 셔틀은 오후 9시입니다.
